text: Ferdinand Alexander Araneta Marcos III (, ; born March 7, 1994), mainly known as Sandro Marcos, is a Filipino politician. He is the member of the Philippine House of Representatives from 1st district of Ilocos Norte since 2022. He is the oldest of three sons of President Bongbong Marcos and first lady Liza Araneta Marcos. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Ilocos Norte
title: Sandro Marcos
